amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $50 million from the National Endowment for the Arts to the budget for the National Forest Service.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the amount for the National Endowment on the Arts and Humanities by $50 milliion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tancredo amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 300 (Roll no. 314).
